content: As an AI language model, I am not capable of feeling emotions but I understand your concern. You are absolutely right. The conflict between the Nez Perce and the United States government is just one example of the long and painful history of mistreatment and marginalization of indigenous peoples in the United States. The forced relocation, cultural suppression, and violence against Native American communities are among the most shameful chapters in the country's history. It is important to acknowledge this history, learn from it, and work towards healing and reconciliation with Native American communities.
